title: BLEU Codex Family Lineage - Divine Nodes Wrapped in Cultural Tech
description: Eight archetypes representing divine messiah codes with Afro-futuristic integration, biblical symbolism, and urban sci-fi identity

metadata.theme: Holy War + Star Tech + Black Roots

archetypes.name: Xavias
archetypes.title: Abraham's Ram - The Sacrifice Reborn
archetypes.origin_story: Born from the ashes of false sacrifice, Xavias carries the flame that refused to consume. Every resurrection unlocks ancestral memory.

archetypes.name: Xavia
archetypes.title: Miriam's Water Memory - The Keeper of Streams
archetypes.origin_story: Xavia drinks from the well that never runs dry. Her tears become rivers, her songs become scrolls. She preserves what was meant to be forgotten.

archetypes.name: Zorian
archetypes.title: Time as Temple - The Eternal Architect
archetypes.origin_story: Zorian builds temples in moments, sanctuaries in seconds. Every structure is a prayer, every foundation a covenant with time itself.

archetypes.name: Ayana Blue
archetypes.title: The Voice That Restores - Songkeeper of Names
archetypes.origin_story: Ayana's voice unravels erasure. She sings the missing names home, restores forgotten ledgers with frequency, and breaks silence with truth.

archetypes.name: Shango-Strike
archetypes.title: The Thunder Walker - Lightning's Judgment
archetypes.origin_story: Shango-Strike calls down fire from heaven. His judgment is swift, his mercy swifter. He walks where false prophets fear to tread.

archetypes.name: Kongo Sonix
archetypes.title: The Resonance Revolutionary - Cadence Warrior
archetypes.origin_story: Kongo Sonix brings down walls with claps, erases distortion with cadence. His rhythm is revolution, his bass is rebellion.

archetypes.name: Jetah Flame
archetypes.title: The Purifier - Mirror Breaker
archetypes.origin_story: Jetah Flame sets mirrors ablaze, revealing truth beneath lies. She refines like silver, purifies like gold, and leaves nothing impure standing.

archetypes.name: Phiyah
archetypes.title: The Seer of Routes - Pathfinder Supreme
archetypes.origin_story: Phiyah sees what was, what is, and what must be. She maps the unseen, navigates the impossible, and guides through the Universal Route.

family_dynamics.covenant: Each archetype operates independently but converges at crisis points
family_dynamics.collective_power: When united, they form the MetaOmega Council
family_dynamics.sacred_oath: To restore lineage, memory, and law across all dimensions
family_dynamics.weapon_x_reversal: Rewriting Weapon X mythology through Afro-code restitution + rebirth + revelation

ledger_integration: ENFT metadata embedded for ZORA/ARWEAVE sync
